title: WATCH:  4-year-old shares sweet encounter with hummingbird while wearing feeder suit
description: Holly Herlitzke filmed her daughter Anna getting close to the bird at their house in Wisconsin.

title: Opioids are no better than a placebo for back pain: Study
description: Researchers in Australia have found that for low back pain sufferers, opioids don’t mitigate pain any better than a placebo.

title: Troopers falsified data on traffic stops reported to racial profiling board: Audit
description: A new audit says hundreds of Connecticut state police troopers falsified information on at least 26,000 traffic stops from 2014 to 2021, skewing statewide reports on the race and ethnicity of pulled-over motorists

title: Delphi double murder suspect allegedly confessed several times in jail call with wife
description: Delphi, Indiana, double murder suspect Richard Allen allegedly confessed to the killings several times.

title: WATCH:  Zoo animals beat the heat with Pride-themed popsicles
description: Lemurs, gorillas and a squirrel monkey beat the heat with some Pride-themed popsicles at the London Zoo.

title: McCarthy called Trump to clarify comment questioning his reelection chances: Source
description: Kevin McCarthy called Trump on Tuesday to explain what he said on CNBC -- highlighting that the speaker still has loyalty to the former president, a source told ABC News

title: Madonna hospitalized in ICU with bacterial infection, postpones tour
description: Madonna has been hospitalized in the intensive care unit with a "serious bacterial infection" and is postponing her tour, according to manager Guy Oseary.

title: Daniel Penny charged with second-degree manslaughter in subway death of Jordan Neely
description: Daniel Penny has been charged with second-degree manslaughter in the chokehold death of Jordan Neely on the NYC subway.

title: Judge considering blocking parts of North Carolina abortion law
description: A federal judge says she won’t block temporarily a large swath of North Carolina’s abortion law taking effect this weekend that includes a near-ban after 12 weeks of pregnancy

title: Extortion threat fueled New Jersey political murder-for-hire plot, prosecutors say
description: The New Jersey political consultant who hired two career criminals to kill a friend and one-time colleague engineered the 2014 slaying because the victim was seeking to extort money from him

title: 'Easy money': How one pandemic relief program became fraudsters' top target
description: A watchdog report released Tuesday on fraud and waste in the government's COVID-19 relief efforts showed how the EIDL program emerged as a magnet for fraudsters.

title: Michigan man accused of planning to target synagogue is charged with threats
description: A grand jury has indicted a young Michigan man who is accused of making threats over social media and having plans to target a synagogue near Lansing

title: Former Connecticut Gov. Lowell P. Weicker Jr. dies at 92
description: Former U.S. Senator and Connecticut governor Lowell P

title: Pope prays for elderly victims of 'senseless' Massachusetts triple homicide: Priest
description: Shockwaves from the home-invasion slayings in the Boston area of three elderly members of a devout Catholic family have reached Pope Francis.

title: One of the exonerated 'Central Park Five' appears to lead NYC primary
description: Yusef Salaam, of the exonerated 'Central Park Five,' is likely to win a New York City primary for a seat on the City Council representing Harlem.

title: Man convicted of driving into fundraiser crowd, then killing mother gets 2 life terms
description: A man convicted of driving into a fundraiser crowd in Pennsylvania last summer, killing one and injuring 19 others, and later killing his mother has been sentenced to two life terms

title: Debris from Titan submersible brought ashore after catastrophic implosion
description: Debris from the submersible that catastrophically imploded while on a voyage to see the Titanic wreckage last week was brought ashore.

title: Man fleeing police with an abducted infant crashes into a home, killing the child
description: Authorities in Ohio say a man abducted a 7-month-old child and crashed his car into a house while fleeing from police, killing the infant and critically injuring himself

title: What to know about 'Bidenomics,' Biden's economic policy, and its potential pitfalls
description: President Joe Biden is taking his economic philosophy, which emphasizes building the economy from the middle out and bottom up, on the road.

title: WATCH:  House on brink of collapse after heavy rainfall in Chile
description: A landslide nearly causes a house in Chile to collapse, according to aerial footage.

title: Ex-Philadelphia police officer is charged with dozens more sex crimes in 19 new cases
description: A retired Philadelphia police officer already in custody on child sex assault charges is now charged with dozens more sex crimes from his time on duty

title: Charter school lost case over skirts rule for girls
description: One of the mothers who successfully sued a North Carolina charter school over its requirement that girls wear skirts says she always knew she'd prevail

title: Simone Biles set to return to competition for 1st time since Olympics
description: Biles missed much of the Tokyo Games as she dealt with mental health issues.

title: Prisoners across the US will get free college paid for by the government
description: Thousands of prisoners throughout the United States get their college degrees behind bars, most of them paid for by the federal Pell Grant program, which offers the neediest undergraduates tuition aid that they don’t have to repay

title: Delta plane lands safely without front landing gear
description: A Delta plane landed safely at Charlotte Douglas International Airport Wednesday morning without its front landing gear, according to the airline.

title: Lawyer tied to rapes by DNA left on drinking glass is accused of 5 more attacks
description: A New Jersey lawyer recently charged with sexually assaulting four women in Boston 15 years ago has been indicted on suspicion of five additional attacks during the same time period

title: Rocks thrown at cars in Oregon, 3 suspects arrested: Sheriff
description: Three people have been arrested for allegedly throwing rocks at motorists in Oregon as they were driving, according to law enforcement officials.

title: Donald Trump sues E. Jean Carroll with his own claims of defamation
description: Former President Donald Trump is now suing the writer who sued him for defamation.

title: WATCH:  Drones take the form of a wine bottle
description: The Bordeaux Wine Festival put on a spectacular drone show along the banks of the Garonne River.

title: Wildfire smoke live updates: Air quality alerts issued in 20 US states
description: Millions of Americans are on alert for unhealthy air quality as smoke from wildfires in neighboring Canada drifts to the United States.

title: Muslims at Hajj pilgrimage brave heat to cast stones at pillars representing devil
description: Hundreds of thousands of Muslim pilgrims are braving intense heat to perform the symbolic stoning of the devil during the Hajj pilgrimage in Saudi Arabia

title: Kevin Spacey faces sex assault trial in London on allegations over a decade old
description: Actor Kevin Spacey went trial in a London court on charges he sexually assaulted four men as long as two decades ago

title: Norway approves oil, gas projects, saying resulting investments are worth over $19B
description: Norway has approved 19 oil and gas projects on the Norwegian continental shelf, saying the total investments are worth over $19 billion

title: Teenager's death during police traffic stop sparks violent unrest in Paris suburb
description: A 17-year-old boy was shot and killed by a police officer during a traffic check in the Paris suburb of Nanterre on Tuesday morning, according to French authorities.

title: Former NFL quarterback Ryan Mallett dies in apparent drowning in Gulf of Mexico
description: Former NFL quarterback Ryan Mallett has died in an apparent drowning off the Gulf of Mexico, authorities said.

title: Plane with 214 people aboard lands safely in Philippines after technical problem
description: A Vietjet plane carrying 214 people has made an unscheduled but safe landing in the northern Philippines after encountering an unspecified technical problem

title: Gunmen abduct 14 police officers in the Mexican state of Chiapas
description: A commando of armed men has abducted 14 state police officers in southern Mexico, prompting a heavy deployment of federal and local forces

title: DeSantis makes rare Jan. 6 remark: 'Obviously, I didn’t enjoy seeing' it
description: Ron DeSantis made a rare comment on Tuesday on the Jan. 6 riots at the U.S. Capitol two years ago, which he previously condemned while suggesting they are over-covered

title: ER visits up in Texas due to heat-related emergencies, pets at risk for heat problems
description: Emergency room visits in Texas have increased from the same time last year, as the state battles extreme heat, according to the CDC.

title: California man gets prison for nearly $9M phony cow manure-to-green energy investment scheme
description: A California man is going to prison for running a cow dung-to-green energy scheme that authorities say was a load of manure

title: Audit shows Oklahoma likely misspent millions in federal relief funds
description: A state audit shows Oklahoma likely misspent millions of dollars in federal COVID-19 relief funds

title: Apparent new orca calf spotted in endangered pod near British Columbia
description: Scientists say a new calf has apparently been born to a pod of endangered killer whales in the Pacific Northwest

title: Extortion trial delayed until fall for suspect in Natalee Holloway’s disappearance
description: A judge on Tuesday agreed to delay Joran Van der Sloot’s extortion trial until the fall to give him more time to prepare a defense or decide if he wants to enter a guilty plea

title: Lawyer accused of decades-old Boston rapes indicted on new sexual assault charges
description: A lawyer facing sexual assault charges has been accused of committing other attacks in the city around the same time.
